<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source="button_up_png"/>
	<e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" fillColor="0xffffff"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0x000000" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="24" size="20" />
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0xa9a9a9" width="100%" height="24" size="20" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ChatBarSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >

	<e:Group id="group">
		<e:Group id="group_content" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>

</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="CapitalListItemSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" width="300" height="40">
	<e:Image id="user_avatar" width="30" height="30" x="9.4" source="" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="vip_grade" width="28" height="27" x="46.55" source="" verticalCenter="0.5"/>
	<e:Label id="user_name" x="81.25" size="22" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" textAlign="left" verticalAlign="top" text="" height="20" verticalCenter="0" textColor="0xffffff" width="100"/>
	<e:Label id="balance" size="22" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" textAlign="right" verticalAlign="middle" text="" height="20" verticalCenter="0" textColor="0xfcdb16" right="4"/>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="CapitalListItemSkin" width="630" height="176" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Button id="btn_capital" width="561" height="176" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image id="img_capital" width="100%" height="100%" width.down="90%" height.down="90%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Image width="200" height="34" x="79.04" y="115.01" source="bg_online_black_png" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Label id="lb_online_num" text="" x="186.1" y="115.34" height="34" size="19" anchorOffsetX="0" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" fontFamily="Arial" width="53.06" textColor="0xF9BC27" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Label text="在线" x="148.87" y="115.34" size="19" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" height="34" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Label text="人" x="239.57" y="115.34" size="19" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" height="34" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" anchorOffsetX="0" width="17.4" touchEnabled="false"/>

</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="CapitalListUISkin" width="719" height="1199" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="bg_png"/>
	<e:Image width="719" height="1199" x="0" y="0" source="bg_black_png"/>
	<e:Image width="719" height="1199" x="0" y="0" source="bg_capital_list_png"/>
	<e:Image id="img_title" width="177" height="48" y="164" source="icon_grab_title_png" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Group width="719" height="703" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="101" anchorOffsetY="0">
		
		<e:Scroller height="690" width="630" horizontalCenter="0.5" y="-32" anchorOffsetY="0">
			<e:viewport>
				<e:List id="capital_list" width="630" height="796" y="-96" anchorOffsetY="0" horizontalCenter="2">
					<e:layout> 
						<e:VerticalLayout/>
					</e:layout>
				</e:List>
			</e:viewport>
			<e:Skin>
				<e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" width="8" minHeight="100%" height="100%" right="0">
				<e:Skin>
					<e:Image id="thumb" width="8" source="hScrollBar01_png"  scale9Grid="1,1,4,4"/>
				</e:Skin>
				</e:VScrollBar>
			</e:Skin>
			
		</e:Scroller>


	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="groupHeader" width="100%" height="112" y="0" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" horizontalCenter="0">
	</e:Group>
	<!--<e:Button id="btn_close" label="关闭" x="318" y="1059"/>-->
	<e:Group id="groupFooter" width="100%" height="83" x="1" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" bottom="0">
		
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>

				<e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" width="8" minHeight="100%" height="100%" right="0">

				</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>

	<w:Config id="15b38206af0" ></w:Config>

			<e:skinName>

				<e:Label id="lbJingJi" text="         经纪人" x="0" y="-15" size="30" width="180" height="90" textAlign="center" textColor="0xc4d4ea" textColor.down="0xf9bc27" textColor.disabledAndSelected="0xf9bc27" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" verticalAlign="middle"/>
				<e:Image id="imgJingJi" width="64" height="72" x="12" y="-8.08" source="icon-jjr_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:ToggleButton>

			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled,disabledAndSelected">

				<e:Image id="imgAccount" width="64" height="72" x="22" y="-10.08" source="icon-zhanghu_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:ToggleButton>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="HelpPanel" width="719" height="1199" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="group" width="656" height="1000" horizontalCenter="0.5" top="55">
		<e:Group id="bg_group" width="657" height="1000" y="1" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" horizontalCenter="0">
		</e:Group>
		<e:Scroller width="641" height="750" y="216" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0" horizontalCenter="0">
			<e:Group anchorOffsetX="0" width="640" anchorOffsetY="0" height="751">
			<e:Image width="546" height="246.4" y="67" horizontalCenter="0.5" source="icon_kline_help_1_png" x="49" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
			<e:Label text="点差 = 收盘价 - 开盘价" y="334" anchorOffsetX="0" width="552" anchorOffsetY="0" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="30" horizontalCenter="-2.5"/>
				<e:Label text="界面下方有11个下注按钮，对应11个点差区间，您可分析走势进行点击下注。" y="1050.63" anchorOffsetX="0" width="552" anchorOffsetY="0" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="30" horizontalCenter="-2.5" lineSpacing="5"/>
				<e:Label text="一个回合60秒，30秒一个棒子。前30秒是下注时间，对应下注棒(空心棒); 后30秒是等待开奖时间，对应开奖棒(实心棒)。" y="1783.87" anchorOffsetX="0" width="552" anchorOffsetY="0" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="30" horizontalCenter="-1.5" lineSpacing="5"/>
				<e:Label text="例如：" y="1401.91" anchorOffsetX="0" width="552" anchorOffsetY="0" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="30" horizontalCenter="-3.5"/>
			<e:Label text="1，点差" x="22" y="15" anchorOffsetX="0" width="591" anchorOffsetY="0" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" textColor="0xf9bc27" size="33"/>
				<e:Label text="3，如何下注" x="22" y="993.62" anchorOffsetX="0" width="591" anchorOffsetY="0" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" textColor="0xf9bc27" size="33"/>
				<e:Label text="2，点差区间" x="18.67" y="468.33" anchorOffsetX="0" width="591" anchorOffsetY="0" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" textColor="0xF9BC27" size="33"/>
				<e:Label text="4，如何判断输赢" x="22" y="1722.23" anchorOffsetX="0" width="591" anchorOffsetY="0" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" textColor="0xf9bc27" size="33"/>
				<e:Label text="根据行情猜点差区间，猜中即可获得相应赔率的奖励！" x="58.66" y="2938.89" anchorOffsetX="0" width="519" anchorOffsetY="0" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" lineSpacing="10" textColor="0xffffff"/>
			<e:Label text="17681.67 - 17671.98 = 上涨 9.69" x="42.97" y="374.33" size="30" fontFamily="Microsoft JhengHei" anchorOffsetX="0" width="566"/>
				<e:Label text="我们提供了11个点差区间，和下方下注按钮一一对应。" x="40" y="522.01" size="30" fontFamily="Microsoft JhengHei" anchorOffsetX="0" width="596" lineSpacing="5"/>
				<e:Label text="例如：上图中点差 9.69 位于上涨区间 > 0和上涨区间 6 - 15" y="876.34" size="30" fontFamily="Microsoft JhengHei" anchorOffsetX="0" width="583" lineSpacing="5" x="30.68"/>
				<e:Button id="btn_odds_4" label="" x="60.7" y="1565.19" width="83" height="85" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
					<e:skinName>
					<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled" xmlns:game="game.*">
						<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" width.down="100%" height.down="100%" source="btn_odds_rise_png" source.down="btn_odds_rise_pressed_png" source.disabled="btn_odds_rise_pressed_png"/>
						<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
					</e:Skin>
					</e:skinName>
				</e:Button>
				<e:Label id="label_interval_4" text="15 - 26" x="67.19" y="1566.3" anchorOffsetY="0" height="27.33" size="18" fontFamily="lgzbFont" anchorOffsetX="0" width="77" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" bold="true" touchEnabled="false" stroke="1" textColor="0xF5DEAB" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
				<e:Label id="label_odds_4" text="x8" x="67.86" y="1612.86" anchorOffsetY="0" height="27.33" size="27" fontFamily="lgzbFont" anchorOffsetX="0" width="74" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" textColor="0xFFFFFF" bold="true" touchEnabled="false" stroke="1" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
				<e:Label text="代表：上涨点差区间 > 0，1.5倍赔率" x="187.01" y="1484.26" anchorOffsetX="0" width="439.33" size="25" fontFamily="Microsoft JhengHei" lineSpacing="10"/>
				<e:Label text="代表：上涨点差区间 15 - 26，8倍赔率" x="187.01" y="1592.95" anchorOffsetX="0" width="442.33" size="25" fontFamily="Microsoft JhengHei" lineSpacing="10"/>
				<e:Image width="442" height="243" y="2041.25" source="icon_kline_help_2_png" horizontalCenter="-8.5"/>

			<e:Label text="二.活动时间" y="429" anchorOffsetX="0" width="581" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" lineSpacing="5" size="30" horizontalCenter="-0.5"/>
			<e:Label text="三、余额构成" y="619" anchorOffsetX="0" width="581" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" lineSpacing="5" size="30" horizontalCenter="-0.5"/>
			<e:Label text="四、充值余额使用规则" y="829" anchorOffsetX="0" width="581" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" lineSpacing="5" size="30" horizontalCenter="-0.5"/>
			<e:Label text="五、充值余额提现兑换规则" y="969" anchorOffsetX="0" width="581" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" lineSpacing="5" size="30" horizontalCenter="-0.5"/>
			<e:Label text="六、特别声明" y="1189" anchorOffsetX="0" width="581" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" lineSpacing="5" size="30" horizontalCenter="-0.5"/>
			<e:Label text="单笔充值1~99元，不享受返现；\n单笔充值100~1999元，享受100%返现；\n单笔充值2000~9999元，享受100%返现；\n单笔充值10000元及以上，享受100%返现" y="242" anchorOffsetX="0" width="581" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" lineSpacing="10" size="25" horizontalCenter="-0.5"/>
			<e:Label text="即日起至2017年8月31日24点\n随后充返活动力度将适时调整。" y="473" anchorOffsetX="0" width="581" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" lineSpacing="10" size="25" horizontalCenter="-0.5"/>
			<e:Label text="您实际支付的充值金币加上万人猜涨跌的返现金币会构成您的账户余额。 \n例：单笔充值100，返现100，则账户余额为200。" y="665" anchorOffsetX="0" width="581" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" lineSpacing="10" size="25" horizontalCenter="-0.5"/>
			<e:Label text="每笔充值余额提现兑换，需达到充值余额5倍以上交易流水，即可全部提现兑换，提现兑换10分钟之内到账。" y="1017" anchorOffsetX="0" width="581" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" lineSpacing="10" size="25" horizontalCenter="-0.5"/>
			<e:Label text="1.请您根据自己的投资情况进行充值，万人猜涨跌对充值次数不设任何限制；\n \n2.充返活动福利仅提供给正当、合法使用万人猜涨跌游戏的用户。每位参与者的游戏账号、手机设备号、身份证号和微信号都必须是唯一的，任意信息与其他用户重复都不能参加该活动； 活动中，一旦发现有作弊及互刷行为，万人猜涨跌有权取消相关账户活动返现金币、追回作弊所得（对应赠送奖品）、回收账号使用权，并保留取消作弊人后续参与万人猜涨跌任何活动的权利，必要时会追究其法律责任； \n\n3.本次活动最终解释权归万人猜涨跌所有。" y="1237" anchorOffsetX="0" width="581" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" lineSpacing="10" size="25" horizontalCenter="-0.5"/>
			<e:Label text="余额可用于万人猜涨跌游戏的各类模式，无任何限制。" y="877" anchorOffsetX="0" width="601" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" lineSpacing="10" size="25" horizontalCenter="9.5"/>
		</e:Group>
		</e:Scroller>
	</e:Group>
	
	
</e:Skin>
